languages.text: "Им нас обеспечила Теодора фон Валанциус по запросу Адептус Арбитес. Недра Летуса напичканы циклонными бомбами, произведенными по специальному заказу на Кьяве Гамма. В случае угрозы неизбежной потери мира под натиском врага, мы активируем протокол "Забвение". Тотальная аннигиляция планеты. Десятина превыше всего, ей нельзя позволить попасть в чужие руки, и мы готовы пасть вместе с ней, чтобы не допустить этого".

"It was provided to us by Theodora von Valancius at the request of the Adeptus Arbites. The bowels of Leethus are packed with cyclonic bombs, manufactured to special order on Kiava Gamma. In the event of the imminent loss of the world to enemy attack, we will trigger the Oblivion directive and completely annihilate the planet. The tithe is paramount. It cannot be allowed to fall into the wrong hands, and we are willing to go down with it to prevent that from happening."
languages.original_text: "Им нас обеспечила Теодора фон Валанциус по запросу Адептус Арбитес. Недра Летуса напичканы циклонными бомбами, произведенными по специальному заказу на Кьяве Гамма. В случае угрозы неизбежной потери мира под натиском врага, мы активируем протокол "Забвение". Тотальная аннигиляция планеты. Десятина превыше всего, ей нельзя позволить попасть в чужие руки, и мы готовы пасть вместе с ней, чтобы не допустить этого".

The bowels of Leethus are packed with cyclonic bombs, manufactured to special order on Kiava Gamma. In the event of the imminent loss of the world to enemy attack, we will activate the Oblivion protocol and completely annihilate the planet. The tithe is paramount, it cannot be allowed to fall into the wrong hands, and we are willing to go down with it to prevent that from happening."

In the event of the imminent loss of the world to enemy attack, we will trigger the Oblivion directive and completely annihilate the planet. The tithe is paramount. It cannot be allowed to fall into the wrong hands, and we are willing to go down with it to prevent that from happening."

languages.text: «Nos la proporcionó Theodora von Valancius a petición del Adeptus Arbites. Las entrañas de Leethus están plagadas de bombas ciclónicas fabricadas para este propósito en Kiava Gamma. En caso de la pérdida inminente del planeta ante un ataque enemigo, desencadenaremos la directiva Olvido y lo aniquilaremos por completo. El diezmo es lo más importante. No podemos permitir que caiga en malas manos, y estamos dispuestos a hundirnos con él para evitarlo».
languages.original_text: "It was provided to us by Theodora von Valancius at the request of the Adeptus Arbites. The bowels of Leethus are packed with cyclonic bombs, manufactured to special order on Kiava Gamma. In the event of the imminent loss of the world to enemy attack, we will trigger the Oblivion directive and completely annihilate the planet. The tithe is paramount. It cannot be allowed to fall into the wrong hands, and we are willing to go down with it to prevent that from happening."

traits.locale_text: «Nos la proporcionó Theodora von Valancius a petición del Adeptus Arbites. Las entrañas de Leethus están plagadas de bombas ciclónicas fabricadas para este propósito en Kiava Gamma. En caso de la pérdida inminente del planeta ante un ataque enemigo, desencadenaremos la directiva Olvido y lo aniquilaremos por completo. El diezmo es lo más importante. No podemos permitir que caiga en malas manos, y estamos dispuestos a hundirnos con él para evitarlo».

languages.text: “那便是西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯应法务部的要求，特别提供给我们的武器。利瑟斯内部装满了基亚瓦伽马星特别定制的旋风炸弹。一旦这个世界遭到敌人攻击，我们就立刻启动湮灭指令，让这颗行星灰飞烟灭。什一税至高无上，决不能落入邪恶之人的手中。为了防止发生这种情况，我们愿意付出一切代价。”
languages.original_text: "It was provided to us by Theodora von Valancius at the request of the Adeptus Arbites. The bowels of Leethus are packed with cyclonic bombs, manufactured to special order on Kiava Gamma. In the event of the imminent loss of the world to enemy attack, we will trigger the Oblivion directive and completely annihilate the planet. The tithe is paramount. It cannot be allowed to fall into the wrong hands, and we are willing to go down with it to prevent that from happening."

traits.locale_text: “那便是西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯应法务部的要求，特别提供给我们的武器。利瑟斯内部装满了基亚瓦伽马星特别定制的旋风炸弹。一旦这个世界遭到敌人攻击，我们就立刻启动湮灭指令，让这颗行星灰飞烟灭。什一税至高无上，决不能落入邪恶之人的手中。为了防止发生这种情况，我们愿意付出一切代价。”
“那便是西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯应法务部的要求，特别提供给我们的武器。利瑟斯内部装满了旋风炸弹，这些炸弹是在基亚瓦伽马星特别定制的。一旦这个世界遭到敌人攻击，我们就会立刻启动湮灭协议，让这颗行星灰飞烟灭。什一税至高无上，决不能落入邪恶之人的手中。为了防止发生这种情况发生，我们愿意付出一切代价。”

languages.text: 「それは高等裁定局の要請でシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスによって我々に提供されたものです。リーザスの奥は、キアヴァ・ガンマで特注されたサイクロン爆弾で満たされています。敵の攻撃により惑星の喪失が差し迫った場合、我々は滅却指令を起動し、惑星を完全に消滅させます。租税が最重要です。それが悪しき者の手に渡すことは許されませんし、それを防ぐために惑星もろとも消滅することは我々の望むところです」
languages.original_text: "It was provided to us by Theodora von Valancius at the request of the Adeptus Arbites. The bowels of Leethus are packed with cyclonic bombs, manufactured to special order on Kiava Gamma. In the event of the imminent loss of the world to enemy attack, we will trigger the Oblivion directive and completely annihilate the planet. The tithe is paramount. It cannot be allowed to fall into the wrong hands, and we are willing to go down with it to prevent that from happening."

traits.locale_text: 「それは高等裁定局の要請でシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスによって我々に提供されたものです。リーザスの奥は、キアヴァ・ガンマで特注されたサイクロン爆弾で満たされています。敵の攻撃により惑星の喪失が差し迫った場合、我々は滅却プロトコルを起動し、惑星を完全に消滅させます。租税が最重要です。それが悪しき者の手に渡すことは許されませんし、それを防ぐために惑星もろとも消滅することは我々の望むところです」
「それは高等裁定局の要請でシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスによって我々に提供されたものです。リーザスの奥は、キアヴァ・ガンマで特注されたサイクロン爆弾で満たされています。敵の攻撃により惑星の喪失が差し迫った場合、我々は滅却プロトコルを起動し、惑星を完全に消滅させます。租税が最重要です。それが悪しき者の手に渡すことは許されませんし、それを防ぐために惑星もろとも消滅することは我々の望むところです」

languages.text: « Elle nous a été fournie par Théodora von Valancius à la demande de l'Adeptus Arbites. Les entrailles de Leethus sont truffées de bombes cycloniques fabriquées spécialement à cet effet sur Kiava Gamma. En cas de perte imminente de la planète au profit de l'ennemi, nous avons ordre de déclencher la directive Oblitération et de l'anéantir intégralement. Rien n'est plus important que la dîme sacrée. Quoi qu'il en coûte, elle ne doit surtout pas tomber entre de mauvaises mains, et nous sommes prêts à sacrifier nos vies pour empêcher que cela se produise. »
languages.original_text: "It was provided to us by Theodora von Valancius at the request of the Adeptus Arbites. The bowels of Leethus are packed with cyclonic bombs, manufactured to special order on Kiava Gamma. In the event of the imminent loss of the world to enemy attack, we will trigger the Oblivion directive and completely annihilate the planet. The tithe is paramount. It cannot be allowed to fall into the wrong hands, and we are willing to go down with it to prevent that from happening."

traits.locale_text: « Elle nous a été fournie par Théodora von Valancius à la demande de l'Adeptus Arbites. Les entrailles de Leethus sont truffées de bombes cycloniques fabriquées spécialement à cet effet sur Kiava Gamma. En cas de perte imminente de la planète au profit de l'ennemi, nous avons ordre de déclencher la directive Oblitération et de l'anéantir intégralement. Rien n'est plus important que la dîme sacrée. Quoi qu'il en coûte, elle ne doit surtout pas tomber entre de mauvaises mains, et nous sommes prêts à sacrifier nos vies pour empêcher que cela se produise. »

« Elle nous a été fournie par Théodora von Valancius à la demande de l'Adeptus Arbites. Les entrailles de Leethus sont truffées de bombes cycloniques fabriquées spécialement à cet effet sur Kiava Gamma. En cas de perte imminente de la planète au profit de l'ennemi, nous avons ordre d'activer le protocole Oblitération et de l'anéantir intégralement. Rien n'est plus important que la dîme sacrée. Quoi qu'il en coûte, elle ne doit surtout pas tomber entre de mauvaises mains, et nous sommes prêts à sacrifier nos vies pour empêcher que cela se produise. »

languages.text: "Bu son hat, bize Adeptus Arbites'in talebi üzerine Theodora von Valancius tarafından temin edildi. Leethus'ın içi, Kiava Gamma'da özel siparişle üretilmiş siklonik bombalarla doludur. Düşman saldırısında dünyanın kaybedilmesi an meselesi olduğunda Yıkılış talimatını tetikleyecek ve gezegeni bütünüyle imha edeceğiz. Aşar, her şeyden önemlidir. Yanlış ellere geçmesine izin verilemez. Biz de bunun olmasını engellemek için gezegenle birlikte yok olmaya hazırız."
languages.original_text: "It was provided to us by Theodora von Valancius at the request of the Adeptus Arbites. The bowels of Leethus are packed with cyclonic bombs, manufactured to special order on Kiava Gamma. In the event of the imminent loss of the world to enemy attack, we will trigger the Oblivion directive and completely annihilate the planet. The tithe is paramount. It cannot be allowed to fall into the wrong hands, and we are willing to go down with it to prevent that from happening."

traits.locale_text: "Bu son hat, bize Adeptus Arbites'in talebi üzerine Theodora von Valancius tarafından temin edildi. Leethus'ın içi, Kiava Gamma'da özel siparişle üretilmiş siklonik bombalarla doludur. Düşman saldırısında dünyanın kaybedilmesi an meselesi olduğunda Yıkılış talimatını tetikleyecek ve gezegeni bütünüyle imha edeceğiz. Aşar, her şeyden önemlidir. Yanlış ellere geçmesine izin verilemez. Biz de bunun olmasını engellemek için gezegenle birlikte yok olmaya hazırız."

"Bu son hat, bize Adeptus Arbites'in talebi üzerine Theodora von Valancius tarafından temin edildi. Leethus'ın içi, Kiava Gamma'da özel siparişle üretilmiş siklonik bombalarla doludur. Düşman saldırısında dünyanın kaybedilmesi an meselesi olduğunda Yıkılış protokolünü başlatacak ve gezegeni bütünüyle imha edeceğiz. Aşar, her şeyden önemlidir. Yanlış ellere geçmesine izin verilemez. Biz de bunun olmasını engellemek için gezegenle birlikte yok olmaya hazırız."

languages.text: "Sie wurde uns von Theodora von Valancius auf Ersuchen des Adeptus Arbites zur Verfügung gestellt. Im Inneren von Leethus befinden sich zahllose zyklonische Bomben, die auf besonderen Befehl auf Kiava Gamma hergestellt wurden. Im Falle eines drohenden Verlustes der Welt an einen feindlichen Aggressor lösen wir die Vergessenheitsdirektive aus, um den gesamten Planeten zu vernichten. Der Zehnt hat Priorität. Wir können nicht zulassen, dass er in falsche Hände gerät, und sind bereit, mit ihm unterzugehen, um genau das zu verhindern."
languages.original_text: "It was provided to us by Theodora von Valancius at the request of the Adeptus Arbites. The bowels of Leethus are packed with cyclonic bombs, manufactured to special order on Kiava Gamma. In the event of the imminent loss of the world to enemy attack, we will trigger the Oblivion directive and completely annihilate the planet. The tithe is paramount. It cannot be allowed to fall into the wrong hands, and we are willing to go down with it to prevent that from happening."

Wir können nicht zulassen, dass er in falsche Hände gerät, und sind bereit, mit ihm unterzugehen, um genau das zu verhindern."
